message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's a good offer for you in the long run.
I'll give you a better deal than you gave me. But don't wait too long, inflation is coming!
I'm feeling generous! 55 for me, 45 for you. Don't let this chance slip away, Bob!
You didn't take my previous offer, now I'm less generous. Inflation is hurting you more than me, don't forget!
Okay Bob, let's be real. The inflation is hitting me hard. We'll split it down the middle, 50/50. This is my final offer.
